channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As Buffett nears retirement, he’s making his biggest purchase in years
item.description: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway says it is acquiring a “robust portfolio of operating assets,” in Occidental’s OxyChem.

item.title: Tesla delivers a big sales beat, and the end of EV tax credits may not be the only reason
item.description: Tesla reported third-quarter deliveries that topped the highest analyst estimate, but the stock pulled back.

item.title: I don’t want to pay the new $895 American Express Platinum fee — but will canceling the card hurt my credit score?
item.description: If you tell Amex you’re considering canceling, the company might offer you some cash, points or miles as an incentive to keep your card.

item.description: It’s a bad time for the data to disappear.
